Package util.exceptions

It contains new exception types used by the simulation.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
AttributeToValuePredicateException Exception for handling errors while collecting the data from the predicates; during the loading of the execution plan.
LoadExecutionPlanException Exception for handling errors during the loading of the execution plan.
ParseExecutionPlanException Exception for handling errors during the parsing of the execution plan.
RoutingToPredicateException Exception for handling errors during the routing of a tuple amongst the predicates.
RunEngineException Exception for handling errors during the run of the engine.
RunSchedulerException Exception for handling errors during the run of the scheduler.
RunSystemException Exception for handling errors during the run of the system.
SchedulingTupleException Exception for handling errors during the routing of a tuple.
SystemInitilallizationException Exception for handling errors during the initiallization of the system.
 

Package util.exceptions Description

It contains new exception types used by the simulation.

It consists of three components: 

The LoadExecutionPlanException class
Exception handling during the loading of the execution plan. 
The SystemInitilallizationException class
Exception handling during the initiallization of the system. 
The ParseExecutionPlanException class
Exception handling during the parsing of the execution plan. 
The AttributeToValuePredicateException class
Exception for handling errors while collecting the data from the predicates; during the loading of the execution plan.
